PerfectNetExp.abs: 败酱目提要39.桔梗目（campanulales）桔梗科（campanulaceae ,bellflower family）

means.word_mean: 1. an order or plants of the subclass Asteridae including: Campanulaceae; Lobeliaceae; Cucurbitaceae; Goodeniaceae; Compositae
